body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Start a Duel
2. Click on the Generate Deck Button What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: Generate a new unsaved deck like at the start of a duel.
What you get: A random one of your saved decks. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.26  / Windows XP SP3 32-bit
author: [Jak1...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/112622755219524898050/)
title: Generate Deck Button loads a random saved deck

comments.body:

**Status:** Fixed

comments.body:
Thanks for reporting this bug.

This is related to issue 213 . In trying to resolve one bug I created the one you report here. Should now be really fixed ...

**Owner:** BeHold...@gmail.com

content:
_From [Jak1...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/112622755219524898050/) on June 14, 2012 22:14:06_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Start a Duel
2. Click on the Generate Deck Button What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: Generate a new unsaved deck like at the start of a duel.
What you get: A random one of your saved decks. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.26  / Windows XP SP3 32-bit

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=221_
